name: Pad n' Ball
description:
MY FIRST GAME EVER!!!

This little game called "Pad n' Ball" was made using Pygame in about 4 hours. I'm new to Game Development and wants to try making a simple game. And I came up with this very simple idea!

THIS WILL RECEIVE UPDATES FOR SURE!

Controls:

A/Left Arrow - Move Left

D/Right Arrow - Move Right
